channel.title: Home on Lukas Mayr
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Lukas Mayr

item.title: Type-Safe Programming in Python
item.description: Python is celebrated for its simplicity and flexibility, but these features come with a trade-off: a lack of built-in type safety. This can lead to bugs that are hard to track down, especially in large codebases.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Selection of Projects In the following i would like to highlight some of the projects i have made in the past. please note that this list is under construction and will be updated soon :) SmartBreeze A prototype smart home system employs IoT devices to monitor temperature and humidity, transmitting this data to a server. The server processes the information and controls the airflow in a building by automatically opening and closing windows using a novel pressure principle.

item.title: Contact
